talk.author: did:plc:pyaersrh4ghzdldjfa2si6kb
talk.utter: The point is that we expect the Democrats to have some principles and integrity. We have no such expectations of Trump. In terms of ethics, you are not a "pro", Jeff, only a  loudmouth.

talk.author: did:plc:6k4ro6llkcnopqsa3pjdtiph
talk.utter: Principles and integrity have given us Trump. Democrats have to take off the kid gloves and play by the new rules.

talk.author: did:plc:pyaersrh4ghzdldjfa2si6kb
talk.utter: Discrediting and corrupting politics is Trump's strategy - how does joining in the dive to the bottom help the Democrats?

talk.author: did:plc:pyaersrh4ghzdldjfa2si6kb
talk.utter: Discrediting and corrupting politics is Trump's strategy - how does joining in the dive to the bottom help the Democrats?

talk.author: did:plc:6k4ro6llkcnopqsa3pjdtiph
talk.utter:
We can't keep playing by the rules with someone that refuses to do the same. We've tried. And tried. And tried.

It'll help because we'll use our powers for good (or at least better). We've really been dealing with Trump and his bullshit for a decade. 

No more Mr. Nice Guy. Fuck the high road.

talk.author: did:plc:pyaersrh4ghzdldjfa2si6kb
talk.utter: No one made Biden repeatedly swear he would not pardon his son. He could have avoided being definite - but he chose to  make a very clear promise to the American public. Now he's betrayed it. There's nothing left when politicians lie for convenience.
